snippet: Soloman Howard gives voice to Muhammad Ali in a one-act opera by the composer D. J. Sparr based on Davis Miller’s memoir about his friendship with the boxing legend.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews D J Sparr one-act opera Approaching Ali, starring David Kravitz, at Kennedy Center Terrace Theater as part of Washington National Opera's American Opera Initiative program.
lead_paragraph: Soloman Howard gives voice to Muhammad Ali in a one-act opera by the composer D. J. Sparr based on Davis Miller’s memoir about his friendship with the boxing legend.

headline.seo: ‘Approaching Ali’ by D. J. Sparr at Kennedy Center
headline.main: New Ring For Legend Of Boxing: Opera Stage
headline.print_headline: New Ring For Legend Of Boxing: Opera Stage
